q1.question: What is this platform?
q1.answer: This is Algeria's first automated content platform. It helps you create brands, generate social media content with AI, and schedule posts automatically across all platforms.

q2.question: How does AI content generation work?
q2.answer: You set up your brand's voice and style, then our AI generates engaging posts tailored to your brand. You can generate content for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, and more.

q3.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q3.answer: No! The platform is designed to be simple. Just create your brand, click generate, and get professional content instantly. No coding or technical skills required.

q4.question: What platforms are supported?
q4.answer: We support all major social platforms including Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Twitter/X, and more. You can manage all your content from one dashboard.

q5.question: Can I manage multiple brands?
q5.answer: Yes! Depending on your plan, you can manage 2 to unlimited brands. Each brand has its own voice, style, and content. Perfect for agencies and businesses with multiple products.

q6.question: How many posts can I create?
q6.answer: The Free plan includes 20 posts, Pro plan includes 1,000 posts, and Business plan includes up to 90,000 posts per month. Upgrade anytime as you grow.

q7.question: Is payment in Algerian Dinar?
q7.answer: Yes! All prices are in Algerian Dinar (DA). We're built for Algerian businesses with local payment options and support.

q8.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q8.answer: Yes! There are no long-term contracts. You can cancel or change your plan anytime from your dashboard.
